Name: Lucia
Text: The party is over, but where is Lucia? You want to stay with her on an important day like this...

Name: Lee
Text: Tranquility has been restored in the Gray Raven lounge. As you walk back to your room through the empty corridor, you see Lee, who has been waiting at the door.

Name: Liv
Text: The evening has fallen. It is almost the time you and Liv agreed to meet. Better go back to the Gray Raven lounge now.

Name: Sophia
Text: Commandant, would you like a birthday package? It includes a dance performance prepared specifically for you. And... it's free, of course.

Name: Changyu
Text: Commandant, would you like to check out my secret base? You won't be disappointed!

Name: Chrome
Text: There's a briefing meeting that requires both the representatives of Strike Hawk and Gray Raven to be present... Could we have some time alone after the work is done?

Name: Kamui
Text: Based on Kamui's habit, he will probably send you a text or appear out of nowhere, laughing.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Let's meet at the agreed place. I want to say "Happy Birthday" in person.

Name: Camu
Text: Have you finally finished all that noisy event? Don't go back to the lounge yet! And don't ask me why!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hey! Don't look! It's not ready yet!

Name: Luna
Text: The night has become silent again. The moon still gazes upon the dim street.

Name: α
Text: If you have time tonight, just come out. I'll be waiting here—that being said, you can stay in Gray Raven's lounge if you are too exhausted... Still, I'll wait here for you.

Name: Roland
Text: After finishing an exhausting mission, you feel like you have heard a familiar, dangerous voice in your dream...

Name: Lamia
Text: The tide whispers in the evening breeze, fish swimming through the waves. Everyone has a patch of blue in their hearts. Is that the sea, or a shy silhouette?

Name: Watanabe
Text: I want to spend this meaningful day with you.

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant! I prepared a very interesting "present" for your birthday this year. You will love it! I promise!

Name: Selena
Text: With iris petals attached to the envelope, this letter has a faint fragrance. Between the elegant writing is a palpable expectation.

Name: Nanami
Text: Here you come, Commandant. I've been waiting! Ready to check out the mega surprise that Nanami prepared for you?

Name: Haicma
Text: You are willing to help me collect the data for my card fortune-telling research...? Sure. I'll wait for you at the shopping street.

Name: Hanying
Text: An exquisite letter with beautiful writing on it. The last part of this invitation contains a set of coordinates that points to a location in Kowloong.

Name: Bianca
Text: Happy Birthday, Commandant... Could you meet me here tonight? I have prepared a gift for you.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, the Forest Guards have prepared a birthday party for you. Do you have time to come to the party with me?

Name: Vera
Text: Want me to celebrate your birthday with you? Better think carefully, because it will be something you'll never forget for the rest of your life.

Name: No. 21
Text: I have a big surprise that will shock 【kuroname】. Come get it now.

Name: Noctis
Text: It's your birthday today. Let's go! Drink till we're drunk!

Name: Qu
Text: You did not see Qu's name in the flooding birthday messages in your terminal. Is she still caught up with work...? Should you check on her later tonight?

Name: Pulao
Text: Here you are, Commandant! Just close your eyes and follow me!

Name: Bambinata
Text: You found a note on the desk. Someone seemed to have written something and erased it repeatedly. They must be trying not to forget something important.

Name: Noan
Text: Voices fade away as the night draws on, leaving only lights that flicker like fireflies. There is always someone waiting for you, just like the light that never misses a beat.

Name: Echo
Text: Near the seal of the hand-folded white envelope is a neatly written line: "To Gray Raven Commandant 【kuroname】. From: Echo."

Name: Ishmael
Text: Today's a special day for doing something special, right?

Name: Luna
Text: So this is the place from the picture. Luna should be here any moment now.

Name: Qu
Text: You haven't forgotten tonight's promise at the mountaintop, have you? I'll be waiting there.

Name: Hanying
Text: A cabin with smoke rising from its chimney comes into view halfway up the mountain path, under a light rain. She is waiting over there.

Name: Nanami
Text: Commandant, Nanami's got a super big surprise for you! Hurry over to these coordinates!

Name: Lucia
Text: Today's mission wrapped up earlier than usual. Go check what Lucia's up to by herself at the video experience hall.

Name: Teddy
Text: You know what I wanted to say, don't you? Then come over, I'll tell you in person.

Name: Bridget
Text: Tonight at 10:00, at the outdoor range in the conservation area. A transport craft'll be waiting there. See you then.

Name: Yata
Text: Gray Raven Commandant, I've found a great spot to unwind recently. Follow me. We'll head out now!

Name: Wanshi
Text: With the sun shining warmly, this morning was perfect for sleeping, but Wanshi's already up. What's he up to?

Name: Lilith
Text: Eleanor's idea of a birthday celebration is... unpredictable. You can only hope her intentions are purely festive. Until it happens, you should stay patient and be prepared for anything.

Name: Selena
Text: The gift she gave you seems to contain a coded message, one meant for your eyes only. You have only this single day to uncover the secret she has buried in her heart.

Name: Jetavie
Text: They say the world will end someday... Who's to say that day won't be your birthday?

Name: Vera
Text: A sense of danger prickles at your senses... You sincerely hope this birthday celebration isn't about to go full "Cerberus" on you.

Name: Bianca
Text: Bianca has invited you to her room. Proceed there to meet with her.

Name: Discord
Text: Discord has invited you to Constellia, hinting at some kind of competition. You should go see what she has planned.

Name: Veronica
Text: A communication from Veronica has come through your terminal, containing specific coordinates. She is summoning you to this designated location.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, the latest health monitoring system is ready. I'll be waiting for you at the cafe.
